name: resuspend
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If small pieces of solid material are resuspended in a gas or a liquid, they are put back into it and they hang or float there: The spermatozoa were freeze-dried and resuspended in distilled water. After the last wash, the cells were resuspended at a final concentration of 106 cells per litre.
More examplesFewer examplesThe cells were collected by centrifugation, resuspended in sterile distilled water, and heat inactivated for 20 min at 70°C.The DNA pellets were washed with 70% ethanol, centrifuged, and resuspended in sterile water.These systems collect, anticoagulate, wash, filter, and re-suspend red cells in crystalloid fluid prior to reinfusion.
